alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Mathews (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:00PM EDT until June 16 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gloucester County in eastern Virginia... Northwestern Mathews County in eastern Virginia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 200 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gloucester Courthouse, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gloucester Courthouse around 215 PM EDT. Hayes around 225 PM EDT. Blakes around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dutton, Belroi, Beulah, Cobbs Creek, Cardinal, Pinero, Selden, Ware Neck, Allmondsville and Fort Nonsense. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
